summary: After dense matter from an imploded white hole hits Earth, the planet's rotation is devastated. A group of government agents must locate a lost satellite network that is the world's only hope for survival.
cast: Robert Knepper|Julia Benson|Cameron Bright|Julia Maxwell|Michael Kopsa|Roark Critchlow|Bruce Davison|Alex Zahara|David Richmond-Peck|Gardiner Millar|Ali Liebert|Hiro Kanagawa|Jennifer Shirley|Isaiah Adam|Douglas Chapman|Ben Wilkinson|Sage Brocklebank|Jeff Sanca|Andrew Chin|Trevor Jones|DTeflon
